### Juan R González, PhD
#### Group Leader, BRGE

**Email**: [juanr.gonzalez@isglobal.org](mailto:juanr.gonzalez@isglobal.org)  
**LinkedIn**: [Juan R González](https://www.linkedin.com/in/juanrgonzalez)  
**GitHub**: [@jrgonzalez](https://github.com/jrgonzalez)

Dr. Juan R González leads the Bioinformatics Research Group in Epidemiology at ISGlobal. With over 20 years of experience in biostatistics and computational biology, he specializes in developing methods for analyzing large-scale genomic data while preserving privacy.

**Research Interests:**
- Statistical genomics
- Privacy-preserving data analysis
- Federated learning in health research
- Genetic epidemiology

**Key Contributions:**
- Co-developer of DataSHIELD infrastructure
- Author of 150+ peer-reviewed publications
- Leader of multiple EU-funded projects on data sharing
